verses.text_plain: The burden of Babylon, which Isaiah the son of Amoz did see.
verses.verse_html: 1The burden of Babylon, which Isaiah the son of Amoz did see.

verses.text_plain: Lift ye up a banner upon the high mountain, exalt the voice unto them, shake the hand, that they may go into the gates of the nobles.
verses.verse_html: 2Lift ye up a banner upon the high mountain, exalt the voice unto them, shake the hand, that they may go into the gates of the nobles.

verses.text_plain: I have commanded my sanctified ones, I have also called my mighty ones for mine anger, even them that rejoice in my highness.
verses.verse_html: 3I have commanded my sanctified ones, I have also called my mighty ones for mine anger, even them that rejoice in my highness.

verses.text_plain: The noise of a multitude in the mountains, like as of a great people; a tumultuous noise of the kingdoms of nations gathered together: the Lord of hosts mustereth the host of the battle.
verses.verse_html:
4The noise of a multitude in the mountains, like as of a great people; a tumultuous noise of the kingdoms of nations gathered together: the Lord of hosts mustereth the host of the battle. ▼
▼ like…: Heb. the likeness of

footnotes.body_html: ▼ like…: Heb. the likeness of

verses.text_plain: They come from a far country, from the end of heaven, even the Lord, and the weapons of his indignation, to destroy the whole land.
verses.verse_html: 5They come from a far country, from the end of heaven, even the Lord, and the weapons of his indignation, to destroy the whole land.

verses.text_plain: Howl ye; for the day of the Lord is at hand; it shall come as a destruction from the Almighty.
verses.verse_html: 6Howl ye; for the day of the Lord is at hand; it shall come as a destruction from the Almighty.

verses.text_plain: Therefore shall all hands be faint, and every man’s heart shall melt:
verses.verse_html:
7Therefore shall all hands be faint, and every man’s heart shall melt: ▼
▼ be faint: or, fall down

footnotes.body_html: ▼ be faint: or, fall down

verses.text_plain: And they shall be afraid: pangs and sorrows shall take hold of them; they shall be in pain as a woman that travaileth: they shall be amazed one at another; their faces shall be as flames.
verses.verse_html:
8And they shall be afraid: pangs and sorrows shall take hold of them; they shall be in pain as a woman that travaileth: they shall be amazed one at another; their faces shall be as flames. ▼
▼ be amazed: Heb. wonder
 , ▼
▼ one…: Heb. every man at his neighbour
 , ▼
▼ flames: Heb. faces of the flames

tokens.text: of them; they shall be in pain

footnotes.body_html: ▼ be amazed: Heb. wonder

footnotes.body_text: ▼ one…: Heb. every man at his neighbour
footnotes.body_html: ▼ one…: Heb. every man at his neighbour

footnotes.body_text: ▼ flames: Heb. faces of the flames
footnotes.body_html: ▼ flames: Heb. faces of the flames

verses.text_plain: Behold, the day of the Lord cometh, cruel both with wrath and fierce anger, to lay the land desolate: and he shall destroy the sinners thereof out of it.
verses.verse_html: 9Behold, the day of the Lord cometh, cruel both with wrath and fierce anger, to lay the land desolate: and he shall destroy the sinners thereof out of it.

verses.text_plain: For the stars of heaven and the constellations thereof shall not give their light: the sun shall be darkened in his going forth, and the moon shall not cause her light to shine.
verses.verse_html: 10For the stars of heaven and the constellations thereof shall not give their light: the sun shall be darkened in his going forth, and the moon shall not cause her light to shine.

verses.text_plain: And I will punish the world for their evil, and the wicked for their iniquity; and I will cause the arrogancy of the proud to cease, and will lay low the haughtiness of the terrible.
verses.verse_html: 11And I will punish the world for their evil, and the wicked for their iniquity; and I will cause the arrogancy of the proud to cease, and will lay low the haughtiness of the terrible.

tokens.text: and I will cause the arrogancy

verses.text_plain: I will make a man more precious than fine gold; even a man than the golden wedge of Ophir.
verses.verse_html: 12I will make a man more precious than fine gold; even a man than the golden wedge of Ophir.

verses.text_plain: Therefore I will shake the heavens, and the earth shall remove out of her place, in the wrath of the Lord of hosts, and in the day of his fierce anger.
verses.verse_html: 13Therefore I will shake the heavens, and the earth shall remove out of her place, in the wrath of the Lord of hosts, and in the day of his fierce anger.

verses.text_plain: And it shall be as the chased roe, and as a sheep that no man taketh up: they shall every man turn to his own people, and flee every one into his own land.
verses.verse_html: 14And it shall be as the chased roe, and as a sheep that no man taketh up: they shall every man turn to his own people, and flee every one into his own land.

tokens.text: And it shall be as the chased

verses.text_plain: Every one that is found shall be thrust through; and every one that is joined unto them shall fall by the sword.
verses.verse_html: 15Every one that is found shall be thrust through; and every one that is joined unto them shall fall by the sword.

tokens.text: and every one that is joined

verses.text_plain: Their children also shall be dashed to pieces before their eyes; their houses shall be spoiled, and their wives ravished.
verses.verse_html: 16Their children also shall be dashed to pieces before their eyes; their houses shall be spoiled, and their wives ravished.

tokens.text: also shall be dashed to pieces

verses.text_plain: Behold, I will stir up the Medes against them, which shall not regard silver; and as for gold, they shall not delight in it.
verses.verse_html: 17Behold, I will stir up the Medes against them, which shall not regard silver; and as for gold, they shall not delight in it.

tokens.text: against them, which shall not regard

verses.text_plain: Their bows also shall dash the young men to pieces; and they shall have no pity on the fruit of the womb; their eye shall not spare children.
verses.verse_html: 18Their bows also shall dash the young men to pieces; and they shall have no pity on the fruit of the womb; their eye shall not spare children.

tokens.text: and they shall have no pity

verses.text_plain: And Babylon, the glory of kingdoms, the beauty of the Chaldees’ excellency, shall be as when God overthrew Sodom and Gomorrah.
verses.verse_html:
19And Babylon, the glory of kingdoms, the beauty of the Chaldees’ excellency, shall be as when God overthrew Sodom and Gomorrah. ▼
▼ as…: Heb. as the overthrowing

footnotes.body_html: ▼ as…: Heb. as the overthrowing

verses.text_plain: It shall never be inhabited, neither shall it be dwelt in from generation to generation: neither shall the Arabian pitch tent there; neither shall the shepherds make their fold there.
verses.verse_html: 20It shall never be inhabited, neither shall it be dwelt in from generation to generation: neither shall the Arabian pitch tent there; neither shall the shepherds make their fold there.

verses.text_plain: But wild beasts of the desert shall lie there; and their houses shall be full of doleful creatures; and owls shall dwell there, and satyrs shall dance there.
verses.verse_html:
21But wild beasts of the desert shall lie there; and their houses shall be full of doleful creatures; and owls shall dwell there, and satyrs shall dance there. ▼
▼ wild…: Heb. Ziim
 , ▼
▼ doleful…: Heb. Ochim
 , ▼
▼ owls: or, ostriches: Heb. daughters of the owl

tokens.text: But wild beasts of the desert

footnotes.body_text: ▼ owls: or, ostriches: Heb. daughters of the owl
footnotes.body_html: ▼ owls: or, ostriches: Heb. daughters of the owl

verses.text_plain: And the wild beasts of the islands shall cry in their desolate houses, and dragons in their pleasant palaces: and her time is near to come, and her days shall not be prolonged.
verses.verse_html:
22And the wild beasts of the islands shall cry in their desolate houses, and dragons in their pleasant palaces: and her time is near to come, and her days shall not be prolonged. ▼
▼ the wild…: Heb. Iim
 , ▼
▼ desolate…: or, palaces

tokens.text: And the wild beasts of the islands

footnotes.body_html: ▼ the wild…: Heb. Iim
